title: #473 Festival of Hustlers with Ali Siddiq
itunes:title: Festival of Hustlers with Ali Siddiq
description:
Former hustler and current standup Ali Siddiq talks with a man who rarely hustles but still does tons of standup Ari Shaffir to talk about all the lessons life gives you. One guy slung dope, the other is one. It's a great conversation from Austin, Texas that brought two cultures together. That taught two peoples about each other. It's a lesson in communication. The boyz realized that words mean different things to different people. But they also realize how similar they were in their upbringing. Even though one dealt drugs, they both remember the space shuttle Challenger explosion. They just kind of had different reactions to it. I'll let you guess which one joked about it as a child and which one thought it was really sad. Ali is one of the best storyteller comedians in the world and he's got a new special out called The Domino Effect which goes a long way towards proving that claim. Check it out now on YouTube.com/AliSiddiq or on his website, AliSiddiq.com. 
 

 

For more Ari Shaffir:

Special Taping June 11-12 in New York: Ari Shaffir: Jew 

For all upcoming shows & tickets: Tour — Ari Shaffir 

Subscribe on YouTube

Cool merch & more


For more Ali Siddiq:

The Domino Effect [One Hour Stand Up Special] | Ali Siddiq

https://www.instagram.com/alisiddiq/ 

https://twitter.com/Ali_Speaks

https://www.alisiddiq.com/ 

 

The Music:

Ali Bombaye

Rick Ross - Everyday I’m Hustlin’

John Denver - Flying For Me

Michael Jackson - Bad

 

Thank you 3Chi for sponsoring this episode! Head to 3chi.com and use code "Ari" for 5% off your order.
